message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is a great price, considering its value to you is $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're willing to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $1300000. This is a fair price, considering the value it holds for you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1250000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand you're trying to find a fair price, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $1280000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the value it holds for me.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1235000. I think this is the best compromise we can reach, considering the value I'll get from the product.

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $1260000. This is my final offer, considering the value it holds for me.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'll make one last offer: $1210000. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll buy the product from you.

I understand you're willing to walk away, Bob, but I'm not willing to compromise further. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1270000, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider other offers.
